label: sustainabilityInfo
comment: An array of SustainabilityClaim objects representing various sustainability claims about the product batch.

rangeIncludes.comment: The SustainabilityClaim class represents specific claims regarding the sustainability of a product, providing details about the metrics, thresholds, and evidences supporting the claim.

domainIncludes.comment: The ProductBatch class holds information related to a specific batch of products, including manufacturing details, sustainability claims and provenance information.
